source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Use: Grants the user invisibility for 14-18 sec. (10 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Helm of the Awakened Soul

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, causing an Upheveal at 100% effectiveness that does not knock enemies up. Casting Breath of Eons always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.

Transmogrified to:

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Dark Iron Chain Boots

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.9 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Bracers of Tempestuous Fury

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, causing an Upheveal at 100% effectiveness that does not knock enemies up. Casting Breath of Eons always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
